mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_event (creator_id, event_name, region, venue, address_id, start_date, end_date, registration_start, registration_end, contact_phone, image_url, event_status, prize_info, entry_fee, max_participants, event_description) VALUES (#{creatorId}, #{eventName}, #{region}, #{venue}, #{addressId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{registrationStart}, #{registrationEnd}, #{contactPhone}, #{imageUrl}, #{eventStatus}, #{prizeInfo}, #{entryFee}, #{maxParticipants}, #{eventDescription})
mapper.select: SELECT e.*, a.road_address, a.landlot_address, a.extra_address, a.latitude, a.longitude, s.sponsor_name, s.sponsor_type, s.sponsor_url FROM bg_event e LEFT JOIN bg_address a ON e.address_id = a.address_id LEFT JOIN bg_event_sponsor s ON e.event_id = s.event_id WHERE e.event_id = #{eventId}
SELECT * FROM bg_event WHERE creator_id = #{creatorId} ORDER BY start_date DESC
